doc.field: FYI is an internal Time Inc. staff newsletter. The index cards contain names and subjects mentioned within the newsletter up through 2000. In 2002, Time Inc. began distributing the newsletter online. Along with the date of the FYI issue, the card may include a brief description of the article. The majority of index cards are for staff members. Also included are article subjects (banks, Dracula, hurricanes, journalim careers, lunch guide, military absentees, novels about Time Inc., running, typing contest); Time Inc. departments (Human Resources, Lecturers' Bureau, Letters to the Editor); and Time Inc. events (lease renewals of building, retirements, rubber tree arrives at Reception Center, TV filming at the Time and Life Building). There are also large sections for the Exhibition Center, Fortune, Life, March of Time, News Service, Sports Illustrated, Time, Time Inc., and Time-Life.
The index may not be in exact alphabetical order due to years of use.
